WRITING.TEXT:
Here's the manual - http://www.teknatool.com/products/lathes/CometII/Downloads/Comet%20II%20Manual%20Final%20_19%20April%202013.pdf
Check the belts to see if they look undamaged before turning it on.

He's the former director of the observatory, but the current director is Guy Consolmagno and is also not a believer in creationism. Here's an interview with him that largely focuses on the topic - http://scicom.ucsc.edu/publications/QandA/2008/consolmagno.html
Where do you get your sapphire spheres? I've been making some tops lately and it would be interesting to try them.

I'd say Fingerprint as well. Fingerprint has the best combination of design, technique and execution in the group. While Lychee is colorful and interesting, there are visible tooling marks on the interior. Trapped is my favorite for design with the off-center alignment, but the surface is rough from the grain pulling out. Good set of bowls - let us know how it goes.

I'll follow up if she sends me a picture. I asked her for one of it unrolled. Part of the fun of this project was knowing that an inner-city school was getting an item that very possibly no other school in the US has.

WRITING.TITLE: DIY Tabula Peutingeriana scroll project (Roman Empire map)
